## Prerequisites:

-   Install the latest version of R on your computer

    -   [https://cloud.r-project.org/](https://cloud.r-project.org/){target="_blank"}

-   Install the latest version of RStudio Desktop on your computer

    -   [https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download){target="_blank"}

### Optional (advanced):

-   Install git

    -   [https://git-scm.com/downloads](https://git-scm.com/downloads){target="_blank"}

-   Make sure you know your GitHub login/create a GitHub account if you don't have one already

    -   [https://github.com/](https://github.com/){target="_blank"}
